name: Box
natural_language_description: 这是 Box 节点。主要用于: Consume Box API

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: file
available_options: File (值: file)
Folder (值: folder)
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Create (值: create) - Create a folder
Delete (值: delete) - Delete a folder
Get (值: get) - Get a folder
Search (值: search) - Search files
Share (值: share) - Share a folder
Update (值: update) - Update folder
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

fileId.name: fileId
fileId.description: The ID of the file to share
fileId.natural_language_description: 参数名: File ID | 作用: The ID of the file to share

parentId.name: parentId
parentId.description: ID of the folder you want to create the new folder in. if not defined it will be created on the root folder.
parentId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Parent ID | 作用: ID of the folder you want to create the new folder in. if not defined it will be created on the root folder.

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: contet_types (值: None) - Limits search results to items with the given content types. Content types are defined as a comma-separated lists of Box recognized content types.
createdRangeUi (值: None)
direction (值: None) - Defines the direction in which search results are ordered. Default value is DESC.
fields (值: None) - A comma-separated list of attributes to include in the response. This can be used to request fields that are not normally returned in a standard response.
file_extensions (值: None) - Limits search results to a comma-separated list of file extensions
ancestor_folder_ids (值: None) - Limits search results to items within the given list of folders. Folders are defined as a comma-separated lists of folder IDs.
scope (值: None) - Limits search results to a user scope
size_range (值: None) - Limits search results to items within a given file size range. File size ranges are defined as comma-separated byte sizes.
sort (值: None) - Returns the results ordered in descending order by date at which the item was last modified
trash_content (值: None) - Controls if search results include the trash
updatedRangeUi (值: None)
owner_user_ids (值: None) - Limits search results to items owned by the given list of owners. Owners are defined as a comma-separated list of user IDs.

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Input Binary Field | 提示: The name of the input binary field containing the file to be uploaded | 默认值: data | (必填项)

query.name: query
query.description: The string to search for. This query is matched against item names, descriptions, text content of files, and various other fields of the different item types.
query.natural_language_description: 参数名: Query | 作用: The string to search for. This query is matched against item names, descriptions, text content of files, and various other fields of the different item types.

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

accessibleBy.name: accessibleBy
accessibleBy.description: The type of object the file will be shared with
accessibleBy.natural_language_description: 参数名: Accessible By | 作用: The type of object the file will be shared with | 默认值: user
available_options: User (值: user)
Group (值: group)

useEmail.name: useEmail
useEmail.description: Whether identify the user by email or ID
useEmail.natural_language_description: 参数名: Use Email | 作用: Whether identify the user by email or ID | 默认值: True

email.name: email
email.description: The user's email address to share the folder with
email.natural_language_description: 参数名: Email | 作用: The user's email address to share the folder with

userId.name: userId
userId.description: The user's ID to share the folder with
userId.natural_language_description: 参数名: User ID | 作用: The user's ID to share the folder with

groupId.name: groupId
groupId.description: The group's ID to share the folder with
groupId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Group ID | 作用: The group's ID to share the folder with

role.name: role
role.natural_language_description: 参数名: Role | 作用: The level of access granted | 默认值: editor
available_options: Co-Owner (值: coOwner) - A Co-owner has all of functional read/write access that an editor does
Editor (值: editor) - An editor has full read/write access to a folder or file
Previewer (值: previewer) - A previewer has limited read access
Previewer Uploader (值: previewerUploader) - This access level is a combination of Previewer and Uploader
Uploader (值: uploader) - An uploader has limited write access
Viewer (值: viewer) - A viewer has read access to a folder or file
Viewer Uploader (值: viewerUploader) - This access level is a combination of Viewer and Uploader

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: can_view_path (值: None) - Whether the invited users can see the entire parent path to the associated folder. The user will not gain privileges in any parent folder and therefore cannot see content the user is not collaborated on.
expires_at (值: None) - Set the expiration date for the collaboration. At this date, the collaboration will be automatically removed from the item.
fields (值: None) - A comma-separated list of attributes to include in the response. This can be used to request fields that are not normally returned in a standard response.
notify (值: None) - Whether if users should receive email notification for the action performed

fileName.name: fileName
fileName.description: The name the file should be saved as
fileName.natural_language_description: 参数名: File Name | 作用: The name the file should be saved as

binaryData.name: binaryData
binaryData.description: Whether the data to upload should be taken from binary field
binaryData.natural_language_description: 参数名: Binary File | 作用: Whether the data to upload should be taken from binary field | 默认值: False | (必填项)

fileContent.name: fileContent
fileContent.description: The text content of the file
fileContent.natural_language_description: 参数名: File Content | 作用: The text content of the file | (必填项)

name.name: name
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: Folder's name | (必填项)

folderId.name: folderId
folderId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Folder ID | (必填项)

recursive.name: recursive
recursive.description: Whether to delete a folder that is not empty by recursively deleting the folder and all of its content
recursive.natural_language_description: 参数名: Recursive | 作用: Whether to delete a folder that is not empty by recursively deleting the folder and all of its content | 默认值: False

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: can_non_owners_invite (值: None) - Whether users who are not the owner of the folder can invite new collaborators to the folder
can_non_owners_view_collaborators (值: None) - Whether to restrict collaborators who are not the owner of this folder from viewing other collaborations on this folder
description (值: None) - The optional description of this folder
fields (值: None) - A comma-separated list of attributes to include in the response. This can be used to request fields that are not normally returned in a standard response.
is_collaboration_restricted_to_enterprise (值: None) - Whether new invites to this folder are restricted to users within the enterprise. This does not affect existing collaborations.
name (值: None) - The optional new name for this folder
parentId (值: None) - The parent folder for this folder. Use this to move the folder or to restore it out of the trash.
shared_link (值: None) - Share link information
